parameters.content:
# Feature

📰 Automatic RSS Feed Collection: Using RSS Feed Trigger to get the latest articles from TechCrunch.

🛡️ Data Duplication Prevention: Checking existing article links in the spreadsheet before entering new data.

🕸️ Smart Web Scraping: Automatically fetching the source code (HTML) of articles and following Google News redirect links.

🖼️ Featured Image Extraction: Detecting and retrieving the main image URL (og:image) from the web page metadata.

📝 Clean Text Extraction: Separating and cleaning the main article text (Main Content) from ads or menus.

🧠 Bilingual AI Summarization: Using the Gemini model to summarize complex articles into 3 concise sentences in two languages (English and Bahasa Melayu) simultaneously.

📊 Advanced Sentiment Analysis: Measuring the sentiment (positive, negative, or neutral) of articles to add value to the data.

🗂️ Scheduled Data Cleanup: Automatically deleting data rows older than 24 hours to keep the spreadsheet tidy.

📈 Dynamic Data Updates: Updating timestamps on existing rows as per schedule.

🔗 Final Data Merging: Collecting all data pieces (Title, Link, Image URL, BM Summary, EN Summary) from various nodes into a single item before saving.

📣 Multi-Channel Distribution: Distributing the formatted summary to Discord and Telegram simultaneously.

# Social


Github : https://github.com/fyyqq

Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/in/fyqq/

Email : afiqakimy123@gmail.com
